This presentation is aimed at speeding up your adaptation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If, for any reason, you have not received the invitation or have any related questions, please contact your HR BP - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Anastasiia_Fedoruk\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anastasiia Fedoruk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
